a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual death rates at different ages in males, 1933 to 2023
The annual death rate, per 1,000 people of a given age. This is shown for males.
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2024); UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
